name: lunchlab Corp.
description: A B2B foodtech startup offering affordable, high-quality, and highly scalable corporate lunchbox subscription services tailored for small to mid-sized enterprises (SMEs). The company operates a hybrid model of direct manufacturing and delivery, with an ambition to evolve into a full-stack B2B food logistics and technology platform.
one_liner: A B2B foodtech startup offering affordable, high-quality, and highly scalable corporate lunchbox subscription services tailored for small to mid-sized enterprises (SMEs). The company operates a hybrid model of direct manufacturing and delivery, with an ambition to evolve into a full-stack B2B food logistics and technology platform.
